Posts.Content: May 6, 2018 11:41PM holliemcdonell88 wrote: That could be eczema. I have eczema since a few years ago and for me it has been really difficult to accept it. Finding a treatment that actually worked for my type of skin and eczema was a whole journey! Finally, I discovered foderma and the results have been amazing!
Posts.Title: Nipple Dermatitis or Paget's? FLmom34 holliemcdonell88
